Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor launched a first-pitch cutter for his 29th home run of the year in the fourth inning
Sean Manaea tossed seven scoreless innings with five strikeouts
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Carlos Mendoza emphasized the need to maintain intensity and match the energy of the opponent
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Carlos Mendoza highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Joey Pollizze noted the Mets' nine-game over.500 record and their position just one game behind the Braves for the final NL Wild Card spot
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets completed a three-game sweep over the White Sox
The Mets went 7-3 on a 7-game road trip
Others: Garrett Crochet tied an AL record by striking out the first seven batters of the game
